verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: When the earth is shaken with its quake.
verse.verse_2: And the earth brings out its loads.
verse.verse_3: And man says, "What is the matter with it?"
verse.verse_4: On that Day, it will tell its tales.
verse.verse_5: For your Lord will have inspired it.
verse.verse_6: On that Day, the people will emerge in droves, to be shown their works.
verse.verse_7: Whoever has done an atom's weight of good will see it.
verse.verse_8: And whoever has done an atom's weight of evil will see it.
